books.name: Shoe Dog: A Memoir by the Creator of Nike
books.description: In this instant and tenacious New York Times bestseller, Nike founder and board chairman Phil Knight “offers a rare and revealing look at the notoriously media-shy man behind the swoosh” (Booklist, starred review), illuminating his company’s early days as an intrepid start-up and its evolution into one of the world’s most iconic, game-changing, and profitable brands.

books.name: The Side Gardener: Recipes & Notes from My Garden
books.description: A cookbook of vegetable-forward recipes celebrating the beauty of freshly grown produce.
